{{cpp/title|hash{{small|&lt;std::shared_ptr&gt;}}}}
{{cpp/memory/shared_ptr/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++11|1=
template&lt; class T &gt;
struct hash&lt;std::shared_ptr&lt;T&gt;&gt;;
}}

The template specialization of {{lc|std::hash}} for {{c|std::shared_ptr&lt;T&gt;}} allows users to obtain hashes of objects of type {{c|std::shared_ptr&lt;T&gt;}}.

For a given {{c|1=std::shared_ptr&lt;T&gt; p}}, this specialization ensures that {{c|1=std::hash&lt;std::shared_ptr&lt;T&gt;&gt;()(p) == std::hash&lt;decltype(p.get())&gt;()(p.get())}}.
